content.en: Cancer biomarker optimization: Scientists have used algorithms to develop and optimize DNA methylation biomarkers for diagnosing different types of cancer, including lung, gastric, and breast cancer. These algorithms analyze gene expression and DNA methylation data to identify potential biomarkers and predict prognosis. By integrating different types of data, algorithms can improve the accuracy of diagnosis and prognosis prediction for various types of cancer.
content.da: Optimering af kræftbiomarkører: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at udvikle og optimere DNA-methyleringsbiomarkører til diagnosticering af forskellige typer kræft, herunder lunge-, mave- og brystkræft. Disse algoritmer analyserer genekspression og DNA-methyleringsdata for at identificere potentielle biomarkører og forudsige prognose. Ved at integrere forskellige typer data kan algoritmer forbedre nøjagtigheden af diagnose og prognoseforudsigelse for forskellige typer kræft.
